landing.h2-heading: Tangu 2014, zaidi ya wahitimu 40,000 wa freeCodeCamp.org wamepata kazi katika kampuni za teknolojia ikijumuisha:
landing.hero-img-description: wanafunzi wa freeCodeCamp katika kikundi cha mafunzo nchini Korea Kusini.
landing.hero-img-alt: A group of people, including a White man, a Black woman, and an Asian woman, gathered around a laptop.

testimonials.heading: Hivi ndivyo wahitimu wetu wanasema kuhusu freeCodeCamp:

shawn.testimony: "Inatisha kubadili taaluma. Nilipata tu kujiamini kwamba ningeweza kuweka msimbo kwa kufanya kazi kwa mamia ya saa za masomo ya bure kwenye freeCodeCamp. Ndani ya mwaka mmoja nilikuwa na kazi ya takwimu sita kama Mhandisi wa Programu. freeCodeCamp ilibadilisha maisha yangu."

sarah.testimony: "freeCodeCamp ilikuwa lango la kazi yangu kama msanidi programu. Mtaala ulioandaliwa vyema ulichukua ujuzi wangu wa usimbaji kutoka kiwango cha wanaoanza hadi kiwango cha uhakika sana. Ilikuwa kila kitu nilichohitaji ili kupata kazi yangu ya kwanza katika kampuni ya ajabu."

emma.testimony: "Siku zote nimekuwa nikijitahidi kujifunza JavaScript. Nimesoma kozi nyingi lakini kozi ya freeCodeCamp ndiyo iliyokwama. Kusoma JavaScript pamoja na miundo ya data na algoriti katika freeCodeCamp kulinipa ujuzi na kujiamini niliyohitaji kupata kazi yangu ya ndoto kama mhandisi wa programu huko Spotify."

landing.certification-heading: Pata vyeti vilivyoidhinishwa bila malipo katika:
landing.core-certs-heading: Earn free verified certifications with freeCodeCamp's core curriculum:
landing.interview-prep-heading: Prepare for the developer interview job search:

faqs.question: freeCodeCamp ni nini hasa?
answer: freeCodeCamp ni jumuiya ya watu kutoka duniani kote ambao wanajifunza kuandika msimbo kwa pamoja. Sisi ni shirika la hisani la 501(c)(3) la umma.

faqs.question: Je, freeCodeCamp itanisaidiaje kujifunza kuweka msimbo?
answer: Utajifunza kuandika msimbo kwa kuunda miradi mingi, hatua kwa hatua, kwenye kivinjari chako, kihariri cha msimbo au programu ya simu.
Pia utapata vyeti vilivyoidhinishwa bila malipo ukiendelea.

faqs.question: Je, freeCodeCamp ni bure kweli?
answer: Ndiyo. Kila kipengele cha freeCodeCamp hakina malipo 100%. Kozi, miradi, na hata vyeti.

faqs.question: Je, freeCodeCamp inaweza kunisaidia kupata kazi kama msanidi programu?
answer: Ndiyo. Kila mwaka, maelfu ya watu wanaojiunga na jumuiya ya freeCodeCamp hupata kazi yao ya kwanza ya msanidi programu.

faqs.question: Je, nitajifunza ujuzi gani?
answer: Utajifunza ujuzi ambao watengenezaji wengi hutumia kwenye kazi: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Linux, Git, SQL, na zaidi. Pia utajifunza jinsi ya kutumia maktaba zenye nguvu kwa ajili ya ukuzaji wa wavuti, ukuzaji wa programu ya simu, sayansi ya data na artificial intelligence.

faqs.question: Inachukua muda gani kujifunza haya yote?
answer: freeCodeCamp inajiendesha yenyewe. Kwa kweli, inaweza kuchukua miaka kadhaa ya kufanya mazoezi ya kuandika misimbo ili kujifunza ujuzi huu wa kutosha ili kupata kazi kama mhandisi wa programu. Usiache shule au kazi yako ya mchana hadi ujisikie tayari.

faqs.question: Je, nitaanzaje?
answer: Ikiwa wewe ni mwanzilishi, unapaswa kuanza mwanzoni mwa mtaala wa msingi wa freeCodeCamp. Ikiwa una maendeleo zaidi, bado tunapendekeza kuanzia mwanzo, lakini unaweza kuruka hadi eneo lolote unalotaka.

faqs.question: Je, ninapataje vyeti vilivyoidhinishwa bila malipo?
answer: Kwa kila uidhinishaji, unahitaji kujenga miradi yake 5 ya uthibitishaji, na kupata majaribio yote ya mradi ili uweze kudai cheti chako.

faqs.question: Sioni [jina la zana] kwenye mtaala wa msingi wa freeCodeCamp.
answer: Kando na mtaala wa msingi wa freeCodeCamp, Tuna maelfu ya vitabu, kozi na mafunzo ya kuprogramu bila malipo, yenye urefu kamili. Kwa hakika tunafundisha zana zozote za programu unazotaka kujifunza. Tumia tu upau wa utafutaji.

settings.share-projects: Shiriki miradi yako isiyo ya bure yaCodeCamp, makala, au maombi ya kuvuta yaliyokubaliwa.
settings.privacy: Mipangilio katika sehemu hii hukuwezesha kudhibiti kile kinachoonyeshwa kwenye jalada lako la umma la freeCodeCamp. Bonyeza save ili kuhifadhi mabadiliko yako.
settings.data: Ili kuona ni data gani tunayoshikilia kwenye akaunti yako, bofya kitufe cha "Pakua data yako" hapa chini
settings.disabled: Uidhinishaji wako utafichwa ukiwekwa kuwa wa faragha.
settings.private-name: Jina lako halitaonekana kwenye vyeti vyako ikiwa hii itawekwa kuwa ya faragha.
settings.claim-legacy: Ukishajishindia vyeti vifuatavyo vya freeCodeCamp, utaweza kudai {{cert}}:
settings.sound-mode: Hii inaongeza sauti ya kupendeza ya gitaa la akustika kwenye tovuti. Utapata maoni ya muziki unapoandika kwenye kihariri, unapokamilisha changamoto, unapopata cheti na zaidi.
settings.scrollbar-width: Upana wa Upau wa kusogeza wa Kihariri
settings.shortcuts-explained: Within a challenge, press ESC followed by the question mark to show a list of available shortcuts.

danger.heading: Eneo la Hatari
danger.be-careful: Tafadhali kuwa makini. Mabadiliko katika sehemu hii ni ya kudumu.
danger.delete-p1: Hii itafuta data yako yote, ikijumuisha maendeleo yako yote na maelezo ya akaunti.
danger.delete-p2: Hatutaweza kurejesha yoyote yake baadaye, hata ukibadilisha nia yako.
danger.delete-p3: Ikiwa kuna jambo ambalo tunaweza kufanya vyema zaidi, tutumie barua pepe badala yake na tutafanya tuwezavyo: <0>{{email}}</0>
danger.certain: Nina uhakika 100%. Futa kila kitu kinachohusiana na akaunti hii
danger.reset-p1: This will permanently delete and reset all of the following:
danger.reset-item-1: Your progress through each step/challenge (all completed challenges will be lost)
danger.reset-item-2: Any saved code, including partially completed challenges, and certification project code
danger.reset-p2: You will effectively be set back to the very first day you signed up.
danger.reset-p3: We won't be able to recover any of it for you later, even if you change your mind.
danger.nevermind-2: Usijali, sitaki kufuta maendeleo yangu yote
danger.reset-confirm: Weka upya kila kitu. Nataka kuanza tena mwanzo

email.missing: Huna barua pepe inayohusishwa na akaunti hii.
email.heading: Mipangilio ya Barua pepe
email.check: Tafadhali angalia barua pepe yako, au <0>omba barua pepe mpya ya uthibitishaji hapa</0>.
email.weekly: Nitumie barua pepe ya kila wiki ya Quincy

honesty.p1: Kabla ya kudai cheti kilichothibitishwa, ni lazima ukubali Ahadi yetu ya Uaminifu ya Kiakademia, ambayo inasomeka:
honesty.p2: "Ninaelewa kuwa wizi wa maandishi unamaanisha kunakili kazi ya mtu mwingine na kuwasilisha kazi hiyo kana kwamba ni yangu mwenyewe, bila kuhusisha waziwazi mwandishi asilia."
honesty.p3: "Ninaelewa kuwa wizi ni kitendo cha kukosa uaminifu na kwamba kwa kawaida watu hufukuzwa chuo kikuu au kufukuzwa kazi ikiwa watakamatwa wakiiba."
honesty.p4: "Mbali na kutumia maktaba za chanzo wazi kama vile jQuery na Bootstrap, na vijisehemu vifupi vya msimbo ambavyo vinahusishwa wazi na mwandishi wao wa asili, 100% ya msimbo katika miradi yangu iliandikwa na mimi, au pamoja na mtu mwingine anayepitia mtaala wa freeCodeCamp. ambaye nilioanisha naye programu katika muda halisi."
honesty.p5: "Ninaahidi kwamba sikuiba kazi yangu yoyote ya freeCodeCamp.org. Ninaelewa kwamba timu ya freeCodeCamp.org itakagua miradi yangu ili kuthibitisha hili."
honesty.p6: Katika hali ambapo tutagundua matukio ya wizi usio na utata, tutabadilisha cheti cha mtu husika na kutuma ujumbe kwamba "Baada ya ukaguzi, akaunti hii imealamishwa kwa udanganyifu wa kitaaluma."
honesty.p7: Kama taasisi ya kitaaluma ambayo hutoa vyeti kulingana na mafanikio, tunazingatia uaminifu wa kitaaluma. Ikiwa una maswali yoyote kuhusu sera hii au unashuku kuwa kuna mtu ameikiuka, unaweza kutuma barua pepe kwa <0>{{email}}</0> na tutachunguza.

profile.you-change-privacy: Unahitaji kubadilisha mpangilio wako wa faragha ili portfolio yako ionekane na wengine. Hili ni onyesho la kukagua jinsi wasifu yako itakavyoonekana ikifanywa kwa umma.
profile.username-change-privacy: {{username}} anahitaji kubadilisha mipangilio yake ya faragha ili uweze kutazama portfolio yake.
profile.no-certs: Hakuna vyeti vimepatikana chini ya mtaala wa sasa
profile.add-linkedin: Ongeza uthibitisho huu kwa wasifu wangu wa LinkedIn

footer.tax-exempt-status: freeCodeCamp is a donor-supported tax-exempt 501(c)(3) charitable organization (United States Federal Tax Identification Number: 82-0779546).
footer.mission-statement: Our mission: to help people learn to code for free. We accomplish this by creating thousands of videos, articles, and interactive coding lessons - all freely available to the public.
footer.donation-initiatives: Michango kwa freeCodeCamp huenda kwenye mipango yetu ya elimu na kusaidia kulipia seva, huduma na wafanyakazi.

learn.heading: Karibu kwenye mtaala wa freeCodeCamp.
learn.start-at-beginning: Ikiwa wewe ni mgeni katika coding, tunapendekeza <0>uanze mwanzo</0>.

read-this.heading: Tafadhali punguza mwendo na usome hii.
read-this.p1: freeCodeCamp ni njia iliyothibitishwa kwa kazi yako ya kwanza ya msanidi programu.
read-this.p2: Zaidi ya watu 40,000 wamepata kazi za wasanidi programu baada ya kukamilisha hili - ikiwa ni pamoja na katika makampuni makubwa kama Google na Microsoft.
read-this.p3: Iwapo wewe ni mgeni katika upangaji programu, tunapendekeza uanze mwanzoni na upate uidhinishaji huu kwa mpangilio.
read-this.p4: Ili kupata kila cheti, unda miradi yake 5 inayohitajika na upitie majaribio yake yote.
read-this.p5: Unaweza kuongeza vyeti hivi kwenye wasifu wako au LinkedIn. Lakini muhimu zaidi kuliko vyeti ni mazoezi unayopata njiani.
read-this.p6: Ikiwa unahisi kuzidiwa, hiyo ni kawaida. Programming ni ngumu.
read-this.p7: Mazoezi ni ufunguo. Fanya mazoezi, fanya mazoezi, fanya mazoezi.
read-this.p8: Na mtaala huu utakupa maelfu ya masaa ya mazoezi ya programu kwa mikono.
read-this.p9: Na kama ungependa kujifunza zaidi nadharia ya hisabati na sayansi ya kompyuta, pia tuna maelfu ya saa za kozi za video kwenye <0>kituo cha YouTube cha freeCodeCamp</0>.
read-this.p10: Ikiwa unataka kupata kazi ya msanidi programu au wateja wa kujitegemea, ujuzi wa programu utakuwa sehemu tu ya fumbo. Pia unahitaji kujenga mtandao wako wa kibinafsi na sifa yako kama msanidi programu.
read-this.p11: Unaweza kufanya hivi kwenye LinkedIn na GitHub, na pia kwenye <0>jukwaa la freeCodeCamp</0>.

learn.github-required: <0>Unda akaunti ya GitHub</0> ikiwa huna akaunti. Utaihitaji unapounda mashine ya seva ya Linux. Mchakato huu unaweza kuchukua dakika chache.

gitpod.intro: This course runs in a virtual Linux machine using Gitpod. Follow these instructions to start the course:
gitpod.step-1: <0>Create a GitHub</0> account if you don't have one
gitpod.step-3: Login to Gitpod with your GitHub account if you aren't already
gitpod.step-4: Once the virtual Linux machine is finished loading, start the CodeRoad extension by:
gitpod.step-5: Clicking the "hamburger" menu near the top left of the VSCode window,
gitpod.step-9: Follow the instructions in CodeRoad to complete the course
gitpod.continue-project: Clicking the button below will start a new project. If you have previously started the {{course}} course, go to <0>your Gitpod dashboard</0> to continue.
gitpod.logout-warning: If you log out of freeCodeCamp before you complete the entire {{course}} course, your progress will not be saved to your freeCodeCamp account.

learn.submit-public-url: Ukimaliza mradi, hifadhi faili zote zinazohitajika kwenye hazina ya umma na uwasilishe URL yake hapa chini.
learn.complete-both-steps: Kamilisha hatua zote mbili hapa chini ili kumaliza changamoto.
learn.runs-in-vm: Mradi unaendeshwa kwa mashine virtual, kamilisha mazoezi za watumiaji zilizofafanuliwa hapo na upate majaribio yote ya kupita ili kumaliza hatua ya 1.
learn.sorry-try-again: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Jaribu tena.
learn.sorry-keep-trying: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Zidi kujaribu.
learn.sorry-getting-there: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Unafika huko.
learn.sorry-hang-in-there: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Subiri hapo.
learn.sorry-dont-giveup: Samahani, msimbo wako haupiti. Usikate tamaa.

learn.building-a-university: We're Building a Free Computer Science University Degree Program ðŸŽ‰

learn.preview-external-window: Onyesho la kukagua linaloonyeshwa kwa sasa kwenye dirisha la nje.

exam.qualified: Hongera, umekamilisha mahitaji yote ya kufuzu kwa mtihani.
exam.not-qualified: Hujatimiza masharti ili ustahiki mtihani. Ili kuhitimu, tafadhali kamilisha changamoto zifuatazo:
exam.passed-message: Hongera! Umefaulu mtihani na unaweza kudai cheti chako.
exam.not-passed-message: Samahani, lakini hukujibu maswali ya kutosha ili kufaulu mtihani.
exam.question-results: Umejibu kwa usahihi maswali {{ n }} kati ya {{ q }}
exam.finish: Je, una uhakika ungependa kumaliza mtihani? Hutaweza kubadilisha majibu yoyote. Matokeo yako yatakuwa ya mwisho.
exam.exit: Je, una uhakika unataka kuacha mtihani? Utapoteza maendeleo yoyote ambayo umefanya.

ms.link-signin: To complete this challenge, you must first link your Microsoft username to your freeCodeCamp account. Sign in to link your Microsoft username.
ms.linked: The Microsoft account with username "{{ msUsername }}" is currently linked to your freeCodeCamp account. If this is not your Microsoft username, remove the link.
ms.unlinked: To complete this challenge, you must first link your Microsoft username to your freeCodeCamp account by following these instructions:
ms.link-li-1: Using a browser where you are logged into your Microsoft account, go to <0>https://learn.microsoft.com/users/me/transcript</0>
ms.link-li-2: Find and click the "Share link" button.
ms.link-li-3: If you do not have a transcript link, click the "Create link" button to create one.
ms.link-li-4: Click the "Copy link" button to copy the transcript URL.
ms.link-li-5: Paste the URL into the input below, it should look similar to this: <0>https://learn.microsoft.com/LOCALE/users/USERNAME/transcript/ID</0>
ms.link-li-6: Click "Link Account" to link your Microsoft username.
ms.invalid-transcript: Your transcript link is not correct, it should have the following form: <1>https://learn.microsoft.com/LOCALE/users/USERNAME/transcript/ID</1> - check the UPPERCASE items in your link are correct.

donate.credit-card-2: Au toa ukitumia kadi ya mkopo:
donate.need-email: Tunahitaji barua pepe halali ambayo tunaweza kutuma risiti yako ya kodi ya mchango.
donate.went-wrong: Hitilafu fulani imetokea wakati wa kuchakata mchango wako. Kadi yako haijatozwa.
donate.valid-info: Tafadhali weka barua pepe halali, nambari ya kadi ya mkopo na tarehe ya mwisho wa matumizi.
donate.valid-card: Tafadhali weka nambari halali ya kadi ya mkopo na tarehe ya mwisho wa matumizi.

donate.need-help: Je, unahitaji usaidizi kuhusu michango yako ya sasa au ya awali?
donate.forward-receipt: Sambaza nakala ya risiti yako ya mchango kwa donors@freecodecamp.org na utuambie jinsi tunavyoweza kukusaidia.
donate.efficiency: freeCodeCamp ni shirika la kutoa elimu lenye ufanisi mkubwa.
donate.why-donate-1: Unapochangia freeCodeCamp, unasaidia watu kujifunza ujuzi mpya na kuhudumia familia zao.
donate.why-donate-2: Unapochangia freeCodeCamp, unasaidia kujifunza ujuzi mpya na kuhudumia familia zao.
donate.bigger-donation: Je, ungependa kutoa mchango mkubwa zaidi wa mara moja, kututumia cheki, au kutoa kwa njia nyinginezo?
donate.other-ways: Hapa kuna <0>njia zingine nyingi unazoweza kusaidia dhamira yetu ya kutoa msaada</0>.
donate.if-support-further: If you want to support our charity further, please consider <0>making a one-time donation</0>, <1>sending us a check</1>, or <2>learning about other ways you could support our charity.</2>
donate.failed-pay: Uh - oh. Inaonekana muamala wako haukutekelezwa. Je, unaweza kujaribu tena?
donate.try-another-method: Uh - oh. It looks like your transaction didn't go through. Could you please try another payment method?
donate.only-you: Ni wewe pekee unayeweza kuona ujumbe huu. Hongera kwa kupata cheti hiki. Sio kazi rahisi. Kuendesha freeCodeCamp pia si rahisi. Wala sio nafuu. Tusaidie kukusaidia wewe na watu wengine wengi duniani kote. Toa mchango wa kusaidia unaokatwa kodi kwa shirika letu la usaidizi leo.
donate.get-help: Ninawezaje kupata usaidizi kuhusu michango yangu?
donate.how-transparent: Je, freeCodeCamp.org ina uwazi kiasi gani?
donate.very-transparent: Sana. Tuna ukadiriaji wa uwazi wa Platinum kutoka GuideStar.org.
donate.download-irs: Unaweza <0>kupakua Barua yetu ya Uamuzi wa IRS hapa</0>.
donate.download-990: Unaweza <0>kupakua 990 (ripoti yetu ya kodi ya kila mwaka) hapa</0>.
donate.fcc-budget: freeCodeCamp's budget is much smaller than most comparable charities. We haven't brought in professional fundraisers. Instead, Quincy does everything himself.
donate.help-millions: Hata hivyo, kwa bajeti ya dola laki chache tu kwa mwaka, tumeweza kusaidia mamilioni ya watu.
donate.how-one-time: Ninawezaje kutoa mchango wa mara moja?
donate.one-time: Iwapo ungependelea kutoa michango ya mara moja, unaweza kusaidia dhamira ya freeCodeCamp wakati wowote una pesa taslimu. Unaweza kutumia <0>kiungo hiki kuchangia kiasi chochote unachohisi kupitia PayPal</0>.
donate.wire-transfer: Unaweza pia kutuma pesa kwa freeCodeCamp moja kwa moja kupitia uhamishaji wa kielektroniki. Ikiwa unahitaji maelezo yetu ya kielektroniki, tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org
donate.does-crypto: Je, freeCodeCamp inakubali michango katika Bitcoin au sarafu nyinginezo za siri?
donate.yes-cryptocurrency: Ndiyo. Tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org na anaweza kukutumia maelezo ya pochi ya freeCodeCamp. Anaweza pia kukupa risiti ya mchango ikiwa unahitaji kwa ajili ya kodi zako.
donate.yes-check: Ndiyo, tunakaribisha cheki. Unaweza kuituma kwetu kupitia:
donate.how-matching-gift: Ninawezaje kuweka zawadi zinazolingana kutoka kwa mwajiri wangu, au makato ya mishahara?
donate.employers-vary: Hii inatofautiana kati ya mwajiri na mwajiri, na hisani yetu tayari imeorodheshwa katika hifadhidata nyingi kubwa zinazolingana na michango.
donate.some-volunteer: Baadhi ya watu wanaweza kujitolea kwa ajili ya freeCodeCamp na mwajiri wao analinganisha kwa kuchangia kiasi kisichobadilika kwa saa anachojitolea. Waajiri wengine watalinganisha michango yoyote ambayo wafadhili hutoa hadi kiasi fulani
donate.help-matching-gift: Ikiwa unahitaji usaidizi kuhusu hili, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy moja kwa moja: quincy@freecodecamp.org
donate.how-endowment: Ninawezaje kusanidi Zawadi ya Wakfu kwa freeCodeCamp.org?
donate.endowment: Hii itakuwa msaada mkubwa. Kwa kuwa huu ni mchakato unaofanywa kwa mikono zaidi, Quincy anaweza kukusaidia kuupitia kibinafsi. Tafadhali mtumie barua pepe moja kwa moja kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org.
donate.how-legacy: Ninawezaje kusanidi zawadi ya Legacy kwa freeCodeCamp.org?
donate.we-honored: Tungefurahi kutumia zawadi kama hiyo kwa matumizi mazuri kusaidia watu ulimwenguni kote kujifunza kuweka kuprogramu. Kulingana na mahali unapoishi, hii inaweza pia kuwa kodi isiyotozwa ushuru.
donate.legacy-gift-message: Ninatoa, kubuni, na kusia [jumla ya _____ USD (au sarafu nyingine) AU asilimia _____ ya salio na mabaki ya mali yangu] kwa freeCodeCamp.org (Free Code Camp, Inc. nambari ya kitambulisho cha kodi 82-0779546), shirika la hisani lililopangwa chini ya sheria za Jimbo la Delaware, Marekani, ambalo kwa sasa linapatikana 3905 Hedgcoxe Rd, PO Box 250352, Plano, Texas, 75025 Marekani, ili litumike kwa madhumuni yake ya jumla ya kutoa misaada kwa hiari yake.
donate.thank-wikimedia: Tungependa kuwashukuru Wakfu wa Wikimedia kwa kutoa lugha hii rasmi ili tuitumie.
donate.legacy-gift-questions: Ikiwa una maswali yoyote kuhusu mchakato huu, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org.
donate.welcome-stock: Tunakaribisha michango yako ya hisa. Tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy moja kwa moja na anaweza kukusaidia kwa hili, na kushiriki maelezo ya akaunti yetu ya udalali ya hisani: quincy@freecodecamp.org.
donate.how-receipt: Je, ninaweza kupata risiti ya mchango ili niweze kutoa mchango wangu kutoka kwa kodi zangu?
donate.just-forward: Kabisa. Sambaza tu risiti yako kwa donors@freecodecamp.org, tuambie ungependa risiti na maagizo yoyote maalum ambayo unaweza kuwa nayo, nasi tutakujibu pamoja na risiti.
donate.how-update: I set up a monthly donation, but I need to update or stop the monthly recurrence. How can I do this?
donate.take-care-of-this: Tuma moja ya risiti zako za michango ya kila mwezi kwa donors@freecodecamp.org na utuambie kile ungependa tufanye. Tutakushughulikia na kukutumia uthibitisho.
donate.anything-else: Kuna kitu kingine chochote ninachoweza kujifunza kuhusu kuchangia freeCodeCamp.org?
donate.other-support: Ikiwa kuna njia nyingine ungependa kusaidia shirika letu la kutoa msaada na dhamira yake ambayo haijaorodheshwa hapa, au ikiwa una maswali yoyote, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Quincy kupitia quincy@freecodecamp.org.
donate.bear-progress-alt: Illustration of an adorable teddy bear with a pleading expression holding an empty money jar.
donate.bear-completion-alt: Illustration of an adorable teddy bear holding a large trophy.
donate.flying-bear: Illustration of an adorable teddy bear wearing a graduation cap and flying with a Supporter badge.
donate.crucial-contribution: Your contribution will be crucial in creating resources that empower millions of people to learn new skills and support their families.
donate.support-benefits-3: Your profile image will get a golden halo around it
donate.support-benefits-4: You'll gain access to special Supporter Discord channels - <0>join our Discord</0> and use the <1>/supporter</1> command to get access
donate.support-benefits-5: And more benefits to come in 2024
donate.exclusive-features: Here is the list of exclusive features for you as a Supporter:
donate.your-donation-helps-followings: Your donation makes the following initiatives possible:
donate.current-initiatives-1: Creating new JavaScript and Python curricula
donate.current-initiatives-3: Translating our curriculum and tutorials into 32 languages
donate.current-initiatives-4: Creating a free accredited computer science bachelor's degree
donate.community-achivements-2: Published <0>1,045</0> text-based coding tutorials and <0>20</0> free books through freeCodeCamp Press.
donate.community-achivements-3: Merged <0>2,753</0> code contributions into our open source repositories on GitHub
donate.community-achivements-4: Translated <0>2,106,203</0> words to make our curriculum and tutorials more accessible to speakers of many world languages
donate.as-you-see: As you can see, we're getting things done. So you can rest assured that we'll put your donations to good use.
donate.get-benefits: Get the benefits and the knowledge that youâ€™re helping our charity change education for the better. Become a supporter today.
donate.animation-description: This is a 20 second animated advertisement to encourage campers to become supporters of freeCodeCamp. The animation starts with a teddy bear who becomes a supporter. As a result, distracting pop-ups disappear and the bear gets to complete all of its goals. Then, it graduates and becomes an education super hero helping people around the world.
donate.animation-countdown: This animation will stop after {{secondsRemaining}} seconds.

report.details: Tafadhali toa maelezo mengi iwezekanavyo kuhusu akaunti au tabia unayoripoti.
report.portfolio-2: Je, ungependa kuripoti jalada la {{username}} kwa matumizi mabaya?
report.notify-1: Tutaarifu timu ya wasimamizi wa jumuiya, na kutuma nakala ya ripoti hii kwa barua pepe yako: {{email}}
report.notify-2: Tunaweza kurudi kwako kwa maelezo zaidi ikiwa inahitajika.

404.heres-a-quote: Hatukuweza kupata ulichokuwa unatafuta, lakini hapa kuna nukuu:

search.label: Tafuta
search.try: Unatafuta kitu? Jaribu upau wa kutafutia kwenye ukurasa huu.

misc.offline: Unaonekana kuwa nje ya mtandao, huenda maendeleo yako yasihifadhiwe
misc.server-offline: Seva haikuweza kufikiwa na huenda maendeleo yako yasihifadhiwe. Tafadhali wasiliana na <0>support</0> ikiwa ujumbe huu utaendelea
misc.keep-coding: Chochote unachoendelea nacho, endelea kuandika msimbo!
misc.brand-new-account: Karibu kwenye akaunti yako mpya kabisa ya freeCodeCamp. Tuanze.
misc.duplicate-account-warning: Ikiwa ulitaka kuingia katika akaunti iliyopo badala ya kufungua akaunti hii, <0>bofya hapa ili kufuta akaunti hii</0> na ujaribu anwani nyingine ya barua pepe.
misc.email-blast: Kila Ijumaa mimi hutuma barua pepe na viungo 5 kuhusu programu na sayansi ya kompyuta. Ninatuma hizi kwa takriban watu milioni 6. Je, ungependa nikutumie hii pia?
misc.update-email-1: Sasisha anwani yako ya barua pepe
misc.update-email-2: Sasisha anwani yako ya barua pepe hapa:
misc.iframe-alert: Kwa kawaida kiungo hiki kinaweza kukuleta kwenye tovuti nyingine! Inafanya kazi. Hiki ni kiungo cha: {{externalLink}}
misc.iframe-form-submit-alert: Kwa kawaida fomu hii ingewasilishwa! Inafanya kazi. Hii itawasilishwa kwa: {{externalLink}}
misc.slow-load-msg: Inaonekana hii inachukua muda mrefu kuliko kawaida, tafadhali jaribu pakia upya ukurasa.
misc.navigation-warning: Ukiondoka kwenye ukurasa huu, utapoteza maendeleo yako. Una uhakika?

icons.avatar-2: Avatar ya kuweka coding na kompyuta ndogo

aria.move-preview-to-new-window: Sogeza onyesho la kukagua hadi kwenye ukurasa mpya na uliangazie
aria.move-preview-to-main-window: Sogeza onyesho la kukagua kwenye kurasa hili na ufunge kurasa za mwoneko awali wa nje
aria.close-external-preview-window: Funga kurasa za mwoneko wa awali wa nje
aria.show-preview: Onyesha onyesho la kukagua kwenye kurasa hii
aria.open-preview-in-new-window: Fungua onyesho la kukagua katika kurasa mpya na uliangazie
aria.rsa-checkbox: I have tried the Read-Search-Ask method
aria.similar-questions-checkbox: I have searched for similar questions that have already been answered on the forum

flash.honest-first: Ili kudai uthibitisho, lazima kwanza ukubali sera yetu ya uaminifu kitaaluma
flash.really-weird: Kitu cha ajabu kilifanyika, ikiwa kitatokea tena, tafadhali zingatia kuibua suala kwenye https://github.com/freeCodeCamp/freeCodeCamp/issues/new
flash.generic-error: Something went wrong. Please try again in a moment or contact support@freecodecamp.org if the error persists.
flash.went-wrong: Hitilafu fulani imetokea, tafadhali angalia na ujaribu tena
flash.could-not-find: Hatukuweza kupata ulichokuwa unatafuta. Tafadhali angalia na ujaribu tena
flash.wrong-updating: Hitilafu fulani imetokea wakati wa kusasisha akaunti yako. Tafadhali angalia na ujaribu tena
flash.keyboard-shortcut-updated: Tumesasisha mipangilio yako ya mikato ya kibodi
flash.subscribe-to-quincy-updated: Tumesasisha usajili wako kwa barua pepe ya Quincy
flash.email-invalid: Umbizo la barua pepe si sahihi
flash.email-valid: Barua pepe yako imebadilishwa kwa mafanikio happy coding!
flash.bad-challengeId: currentChallengeId si kitambulisho halali cha changamoto
flash.username-used: Jina la mtumiaji tayari linahusishwa na akaunti hii
flash.username-taken: Jina la mtumiaji tayari linahusishwa na akaunti tofauti
flash.username-updated: Tumesasisha jina lako la mtumiaji hadi {{username}}
flash.could-not-logout: Hatukuweza kukuondoa, tafadhali jaribu tena baada ya muda mfupi
flash.email-encoded-wrong: Barua pepe iliyosimbwa kwenye kiungo imeandikwa vibaya
flash.oops-not-right: Lo, kuna kitu si sawa, tafadhali omba kiungo kipya ili uingie / ujisajili
flash.expired-link: Inaonekana kiungo ulichobofya kimeisha muda wake, tafadhali omba kiungo kipya ili uingie
flash.signin-success: Umefanikiwa! Umeingia kwenye akaunti yako. Happy Coding!
flash.social-auth-gone: Tunaondoka kwenye uthibitishaji wa kijamii kwa sababu za faragha. Wakati ujao tunapendekeza utumie anwani yako ya barua pepe: {{email}} ili uingie badala yake.
flash.name-needed: Tunahitaji jina lako ili tuweze kuliweka kwenye cheti chako. Ongeza jina lako kwenye mipangilio ya akaunti yako na ubofye kitufe cha kuhifadhi. Kisha tunaweza kutoa cheti chako.
flash.incomplete-steps: Inaonekana hujakamilisha hatua zinazohitajika. Tafadhali kamilisha miradi inayohitajika ili kudai Cheti cha {{name}}.
flash.cert-claim-success: @{{username}}, umefanikiwa kudai Cheti cha {{name}}! Hongera kwa niaba ya timu ya freeCodeCamp.org!
flash.wrong-name: Hitilafu fulani imetokea katika uthibitishaji wa {{name}}, tafadhali jaribu tena. Ukiendelea kupokea hitilafu hii, unaweza kutuma ujumbe kwa support@freeCodeCamp.org ili kupata usaidizi.
flash.username-not-found: Hatukuweza kupata mtumiaji aliye na jina la mtumiaji "{{username}}"
flash.add-name: Mtumiaji huyu anahitaji kuongeza jina lake kwenye akaunti yake ili wengine waweze kuona uthibitishaji wake.
flash.not-eligible: Mtumiaji huyu hastahiki uthibitishaji wa freeCodeCamp.org kwa wakati huu.
flash.profile-private: {{username}} amechagua kufanya portfolio yake kuwa wa faragha. Watahitaji kuweka portfolio yao hadharani ili wengine waweze kutazama uthibitishaji wao.
flash.certs-private: {{username}} amechagua kufanya vyeti vyao kuwa vya faragha. Watahitaji kuweka vyeti vyao hadharani ili wengine waweze kuvitazama.
flash.not-honest: {{username}} bado hajakubali Ahadi yetu ya Uaminifu ya Kiakademia.
flash.invalid-challenge: Hiyo haionekani kuwa uwasilishaji halali wa changamoto
flash.no-links-provided: Hujatoa viungo halali ili tukague kazi yako.
flash.provide-username: Angalia ikiwa umetoa jina la mtumiaji na ripoti
flash.report-sent: Ripoti ilitumwa kwa timu ikiwa na nakala ya {{email}}
flash.create-token-err: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kuunda tokeni yako ya mtumiaji
flash.delete-token-err: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kufuta tokeni yako ya mtumiaji
flash.token-created: Umefaulu kuunda tokeni mpya ya mtumiaji.
flash.start-project-err: Hitilafu fulani imetokea wakati wa kujaribu kuanzisha mradi. Tafadhali jaribu tena.
flash.local-code-save-error: Lo, msimbo wako haikuhifadhiwa, hifadhi ya ndani ya kivinjari chako inaweza kuwa imejaa.
flash.local-code-saved: Imehifadhiwa! Msimbo wako umehifadhiwa kwenye hifadhi ya ndani ya kivinjari chako.
flash.timeline-private: {{username}} amechagua kufanya rekodi yake ya matukio kuwa ya faragha. Watahitaji kuweka rekodi yao ya matukio kwa umma ili wengine waweze kutazama uthibitishaji wao.
flash.code-saved: Msimbo wako umehifadhiwa kwenye hifadhidata. Utakuwa hapa ukirudi.
flash.code-save-error: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kujaribu kuhifadhi msimbo wako.
flash.code-save-less: Punguza mwendo! Msimbo wako haukuhifadhiwa. Jaribu tena baada ya sekunde chache.
flash.challenge-save-too-big: Samahani, huwezi kuhifadhi msimbo wako. Msimbo wako ni baiti {{user-size}}. Tunaruhusu upeo wa baiti {{max-size}}. Tafadhali punguza msimbo wako na ujaribu tena au uombe usaidizi katika https://forum.freecodecamp.org
flash.challenge-submit-too-big: Samahani, huwezi kuwasilisha msimbo wako. Msimbo wako ni baiti {{user-size}}. Tunaruhusu upeo wa baiti {{max-size}}. Tafadhali punguza msimbo wako na ujaribu tena au uombe usaidizi katika https://forum.freecodecamp.org
flash.invalid-update-flag: Unajaribu kufikia rasilimali zilizopigwa marufuku. Tafadhali omba usaidizi katika https://forum.freecodecamp.org ikiwa hili ni ombi halali.
flash.generate-exam-error: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kujaribu kuunda mtihani wako.

transcript.link-err-1: Please include a Microsoft transcript URL in the request.
transcript.link-err-2: Something went wrong trying to get your transcript from Microsoft.
transcript.link-err-3: A username was not found in your Microsoft transcript.
transcript.link-err-4: That Microsoft username is being used by another freeCodeCamp account.
transcript.link-err-5: Something went wrong trying to save your Microsoft account.
transcript.link-err-6: Something went wrong trying to link your Microsoft username to your freeCodeCamp account.
transcript.linked: Your Microsoft username has been linked to your freeCodeCamp account.
transcript.unlinked: The link to your Microsoft username has been removed.
transcript.unlink-err: Something went wrong trying to remove the link to your Microsoft username.

profile.err: We could not find a Microsoft user ID for Microsoft user "{{msUsername}}"

trophy.err-1: We could not find a Microsoft username associated with your freeCodeCamp account.
trophy.err-2: You are trying to submit a challenge that does not appear to be a trophy challenge.
trophy.err-3: We could not get your Microsoft profile from your Microsoft ID.
trophy.err-4: It appears that the Microsoft user "{{msUsername}}" has not earned this trophy.
trophy.err-5: Something went wrong trying to verify your trophy. Please check and try again.
trophy.err-6: It looks like your Microsoft account might be private. Set it to public and try again.
trophy.verified: Your trophy from Microsoft's learning platform was verified.

survey.err-1: The survey submitted is not in the correct format.
survey.err-2: It looks like you have already completed this survey.
survey.err-3: Something went wrong trying to save your survey.
survey.success: Thank you. Your survey was submitted.

flash.classroom-mode-updated: We have updated your classroom mode settings

validation.max-characters: Kuna upeo wa juu wa herufi 288, umesalia na {{charsLeft}}
validation.same-email: Barua pepe hii ni sawa na barua pepe yako ya sasa
validation.invalid-email: Hatukuweza kuthibitisha barua pepe yako kwa usahihi, tafadhali hakikisha ni sahihi
validation.email-mismatch: Barua pepe zote mbili mpya lazima ziwe sawa
validation.invalid-url: Hatukuweza kuthibitisha URL yako ipasavyo, tafadhali hakikisha ni sahihi
validation.invalid-protocol: URL lazima ianze na http au https
validation.url-not-image: URL lazima iunganishe moja kwa moja na faili ya picha
validation.editor-url: Kumbuka kuwasilisha URL ya Programu Moja kwa Moja.
validation.publicly-visible-url: Kumbuka kuwasilisha URL ya programu inayoonekana hadharani.
validation.ms-learn-link: Tafadhali tumia kiungo halali cha kombe la Microsoft Learn.
validation.path-url: Labda unataka kuwasilisha njia ya mizizi yaani https://example.com, sio https://example.com/path
validation.source-code-link-required: Remember to submit the link to your source code.

certification.fulltext: <0>This certifies that</0> <1>{{user}}</1> <2>successfully completed the</2> <3>{{title}}</3> <4>Developer Certification on {{time}}</4> <5>representing approximately {{completionTime}} hours of work</5>
certification.fulltextNoHours: <0>This certifies that</0> <1>{{user}}</1> <2>successfully completed the</2> <3>{{title}}</3> <4>Developer Certification on {{time}}</4>

project.heading-legacy-full-stack: Kama sehemu ya uthibitishaji huu wa Legacy Full Stack, {{user}} alikamilisha uthibitishaji ufuatao:
project.heading-exam: As part of this certification, {{user}} passed the following exam:
project.heading: Kama sehemu ya uthibitishaji huu, {{user}} aliunda miradi ifuatayo na akapita majaribio yote ya majaribio ya kiotomatiki:
project.no-solution: hitilafu ya kuonyesha suluhisho, tuma barua pepe kwa support@freeCodeCamp.org ili kupata usaidizi.
project.footnote: Iwapo unashuku kuwa yoyote ya miradi hii inakiuka <2>sera ya uaminifu ya kitaaluma</2>, tafadhali <5>ripoti hili kwa timu yetu</5>.

title.Build a Personal Portfolio Webpage: Jenga Ukurasa wa Tovuti ya Kibinafsi
title.Show the Local Weather: Onyesha Hali ya Hewa ya Mahali
title.Stylize Stories on Camper News: Kuweka mtindo katika hadithi kwenye Camper News
title.Build a Tic Tac Toe Game: Jenga Mchezo wa Tic Tac Toe

title.URL Shortener Microservice: Huduma ndogo ya kifupisho cha URL

title.File Metadata Microservice: Huduma ndogo ya Metadata ya faili

title.Manage a Book Trading Club: Simamia Klabu ya Uuzaji wa Vitabu
title.Build a Camper Leaderboard: Unda Ubao wa Wanaoongoza wa Camper
title.Build a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler Game: Unda Mchezo wa Roguelike Dungeon Crawler
title.Visualize Data with a Bar Chart: Onyesha Data kwa kutumia Chati ya Mipau
title.Visualize Data with a Scatterplot Graph: Onyesha Data kwa kutumia Grafu ya Scatterplot
title.Visualize Data with a Heat Map: Tazama Data kwa kutumia Ramani ya Joto
title.Show National Contiguity with a Force Di: Onyesha Mshikamano wa Kitaifa kwa Grafu Inayoelekezwa kwa Nguvu
title.Build a Product Landing Page: Tengeneza Ukurasa wa Kutua kwa Bidhaa
title.Build a Technical Documentation Page: Tengeneza Ukurasa wa Hati za Kiufundi

title.Visualize Data with a Treemap Diagram: Onyesha Data kwa kutumia Mchoro wa Ramani ya Miti

title.Demographic Data Analyzer: Kichambuzi cha Takwimu za Idadi ya Watu
title.Page View Time Series Visualizer: Kitazamaji cha Msururu wa Muda wa Ukurasa
title.Secure Real Time Multiplayer Game: Mchezo Salama wa Wakati Halisi wa Wachezaji wengi
title.Cat and Dog Image Classifier: Kiainisho cha Picha za Paka na Mbwa
title.Book Recommendation Engine using KNN: Injini ya Mapendekezo ya Kitabu kwa kutumia KNN

certification-card.title: Dai Cheti Chako
certification-card.intro: Kamilisha hatua zifuatazo ili kudai na kutazama {{i18nCertText}} yako
certification-card.accept-honesty: Kubali Sera yetu ya Uaminifu ya Kiakademia
certification-card.set-name: Weka jina lako, na ulifanye hadharani

forum-help.describe:
Describe your issue in detail here. Example: 
My h1 element is missing an opening tag. Need help checking my code. 
OR 
My for loop runs infinitely. How to prevent this?
forum-help.too-long-one: Msimbo wa mbegu wa changamoto na/au suluhu lako limezidi urefu wa juu tunaoweza kuvuka kutoka kwa changamoto.
forum-help.too-long-two: Utahitaji kuchukua hatua ya ziada hapa ili msimbo ulioandika uwasilishe katika umbizo ambalo ni rahisi kusoma.
forum-help.too-long-three: Tafadhali nakili/ubandike msimbo wote wa kihariri unaoonyeshwa kwenye shindano ambapo umeunganisha.
forum-help.add-code-one: Badilisha sentensi hizi mbili na msimbo wako ulionakiliwa.
forum-help.add-code-two: Tafadhali acha mstari wa ``` hapo juu na mstari wa ``` chini,
forum-help.add-code-three: kwa sababu zinaruhusu msimbo wako kufomati vizuri kwenye chapisho.

user-token.title: Tokeni ya Mtumiaji
user-token.create-p1: Inaonekana huna tokeni ya mtumiaji. Unda moja ili kuhifadhi maendeleo yako kwenye sehemu hii
user-token.create-p2: Unda tokeni ya mtumiaji ili kuhifadhi maendeleo yako kwenye sehemu za mtaala zinazotumia mashine ya virtual.
user-token.delete-p1: Tokeni yako ya mtumiaji inatumika kuhifadhi maendeleo yako kwenye sehemu za mtaala zinazotumia mashine pepe. Ikiwa unashuku kuwa imeingiliwa, unaweza kuifuta bila kupoteza maendeleo yoyote. Mpya itaundwa kiotomatiki wakati mwingine utakapofungua mradi.
user-token.delete-p2: Ikiwa unashuku tokeni yako imeingiliwa, unaweza kuifuta ili kuifanya isiweze kutumika. Maendeleo kwenye masomo yaliyowasilishwa hapo awali hayatapotea.
user-token.delete-p3: Utahitaji kuunda tokeni mpya ili kuhifadhi maendeleo ya siku zijazo kwenye sehemu za mtaala zinazotumia mashine pepe.
user-token.yes-please: Ndiyo tafadhali, ningependa kufuta tokeni yangu

signout.heading: Ondoka kwenye akaunti yako
signout.p1: Onyo: Ukiendelea, maendeleo yako hayatahifadhiwa tena.
signout.p2: Kitendo hiki kitakuondoa kwenye akaunti yako kwenye kifaa hiki na kipindi cha kivinjari pekee. Tafadhali thibitisha ikiwa ungependa kuendelea.

staging-warning.heading: Warning: This is an early access test deployment
staging-warning.p1: We welcome you to try this platform in a test-only mode and get early access to upcoming features. Sometimes these changes are referred to as next, beta, staging, etc. interchangeably.
staging-warning.p2: We thank you for reporting bugs that you encounter and help in making freeCodeCamp.org better.
staging-warning.p3: Your progress MAY NOT be saved on your next visit, and any certifications claimed on this deployment are not valid. Learn more by <0>following this link</0>.

q2.q: Prior to this course, how experienced were you with .NET and C#?

misc.two-questions: Congratulations on getting this far. Before you can start the exam, please answer these two short survey questions.
